text: hello my name is Emily Ryan I'm the
director of cloud service operations for
software AG we're headquartered in
Darmstadt Germany and we strive to make
businesses successful with their digital
business transformation I'm responsible
for all of our external cloud products
which we have hosted on Amazon we have
nine different cloud products right now
we have a lot of different groups
working to build the cloud products so
initially we needed to get them ramped
up on the technical skills in general we
started with the systems operations
training on AWS and around the same time
we did the solution architect training
as well so we could build and run the
products and then we waited a few months
to get everybody really working with the
products and realizing what they needed
to then learn next
and then we chose the DevOps on AWS
class which really brought all of those
skills together so we can build
continuous integration and continuous
deployment from what we've already
created the biggest tangible impact that
I've seen for us internally is that in
our team's confidence and has really
been built they have great marketable
technical skills now and they've used
them then productively to optimize our
product to improve performance to make
it all-around
functioning better for the customers so
I think that brings value to our
customers as well they also have this
increased vocabulary and they can talk
about the cloud topics with all the
different business lines so they're
bringing you know these cloud ideas also
spreading them within the company I can
see that software AG will benefit
serving the customers from this dev ops
training because really that's where
we're going to bring all of our teams
together we're going to have the product
management groups and rnd and Operations
all contributing to successful products
bringing out faster releases bringing
out more features
increasing the functionality so I can
really see that with the DevOps training
specifically is going to bring us a lot
of value so we have plans the cloud
business is growing our cloud products
portfolios is increasing so of course
then our team needs to grow so I would
say the number one training plan for us
is to bring on new employees and to make
sure that they're also on trained in all
of these different levels of the Amazon
products and then for the team that
they're the established experts of
course there are new products coming out
from Amazon almost every day so we have
to make sure that they get continued
training and keep their portfolio as
well up to date with all the new
products and how we can use them
internally to help improve our products
[Music]
